attributes.action: Stop the proposed destruction of wildlife & Green Land in Ashton, Wigan to make way for another Industrial Estate nobody wants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ashton and our friends in the UK say NO to the Three Sisters industrial expansion.

This new development will:

Devestate the local community and increase the traffic.

Destroy one of our few remaining Green areas.

Be catastrophic to local wildlife.

Cover over 40 acreas of now farm and Green belt land.

Please add your name to this petition and save the town from this development.

Do you have any information on the Linen and Woollen stock charity? 

PLEASE HELP
